game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure to uncover the location of a long-lost treasure. Search ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and overcome obstacles to reach your goal.

task.description: Find the hidden cavern and read the ancient map that reveals the first clue to the treasure's location.
Search the abandoned temple and retrieve the ancient key required to unlock the next stage of your journey.
Decipher the cryptic riddles left behind by the ancient guardians to unveil the exact location of the hidden treasure.
